divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving on the freeway when this white like that looked like a star hoovering just under cloud cover. Then it suddenly shot across in a straight line about half a mile then without slowing down it shot directly straight up into the clouds. This happened in a matter of 2 seconds. The way it moved defies the laws of physics. It was an exciting yet scary experience.
Summary: white star like object under clouds.
